mapper.select: select count(*) from im_message where create_time >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 7 DAY)

select count(distinct a.id) from im_approval a inner join im_approval_node n on a.template_id = n.template_id where a.status = 'PENDING'
and n.approvers like concat('%', #{userId}, '%')

select id, user_id, title, description, priority, status, due_date, completed_time, create_time, update_time from im_todo_item
and user_id = #{userId}
and status = 'COMPLETED' and status in ('PENDING', 'IN_PROGRESS')
order by create_time desc
mapper.insert: insert into im_todo_item (user_id, title, description, priority, due_date, status, create_time, update_time) values (#{userId}, #{title}, #{description}, 2, #{dueDate}, 'PENDING', NOW(), NOW())
mapper.update: update im_todo_item set status = 'COMPLETED', completed_time = NOW(), update_time = NOW() where id = #{id}

select a.id, a.title, a.applicant_id as applicantId, a.status, a.apply_time as applyTime from im_approval a inner join im_approval_node n on a.template_id = n.template_id where a.status = 'PENDING'
and n.approvers like concat('%', #{userId}, '%')
order by a.apply_time desc

select id, title, content, type, is_read as isRead, create_time as createTime from im_system_notification
and receiver_id = #{userId} and is_read = 0
order by create_time desc
